text: aur jab moosa ne apanee qaum se kaha ki bhaiyon tum mujhe kyon azeeyat dete ho haaloki tum to jaanate ho ki main tumhaare paas khuda ka (bheja hua) rasool hoon to jab vah tedhe hue to khuda ne bhee unake dilon ko tedha hee rahane diya aur khuda badakaar logon ko manzile maqasood tak nahin pahunchaaya karata
